channel.title: Recreation [F2P Remake!]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i301.photobucket.com/albums/nn72/localwoodcut/f2premake.jpg[/img]
[b]Please leave feedback; if views over comments become too stupidly skewed I'm removing it >_>[/b]
Hey guys! As promised, my Delta F2P Remake has returned. A lot more stable with high quality content! This source is not playable yet, there's nothing in terms of most skills. Combat works okay. There are no special attacks and very little in the way of any member content at all. I've put a lot of effort into this and received an ideal amount of assistance, too.
[u][b]Runescape 2006 Remake - Free to Play![/b][/u] As always, I've added an couple of "anti-leeches" and if you're not capable of fixing them, you should probably consider taking up knitting. All is required of you is to uncomment stuff. One of the anti-leeches is in Constants.java, one if Food.java and one (which stops you compiling) is in UpdateFlags.java
[u][b]Features[/b][/u] Almost All F2P area NPCs are in the correct location. Most if not all F2P shops should work. Efficient NPC Dialogue. Pickables (Potatoes, Cabbages, Onions and Grain) The wheat windmill works. NPC/Player clipping Teleports require levels and runes. Most if not all F2P consumeables work and provide the right HP. Area music (For all F2P areas except tutorial island) Access to P2P areas isn't possible. Port Sarim boat to Karamja works. A lot, if not all doors work in F2P (including double doors!) 100% tutorial island started. Everything is in the source for you to be able to create 100% tutorial island. You just have to finish where I left off. A couple of other things-
[b]NOTE: I do plan to continue this source right up until the last quest and everything. Please be generous and give back the community if you choose to develop this source, just like I have. Do not insult me for using Delta, Enzo's packaged Delta is decent. Insult me for the content in it.[/b]
[u][b]Links (Source and Client[/b][/u] Mirror 1: [url=http://uppit.com/bg0wuo6uezeg/Recreation.rar]http://uppit.com/bg0wuo6uezeg/Recreation.rar [/url] Mirror 2: http://www.mediafire.com/?5a9vfbfr58444ap
[b]Media[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WDqjx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/CladG.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NK1y0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/GaZAk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/u0Tjy.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/drz0s.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TJN36.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/L9obt.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xpAZI.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QrELV.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gRYmT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NSgK6.png[/img] [URL=http://i301.photobucket.com/albums/nn72/localwoodcut/RSMV0014.mp4]http://i301.photobucket.com/albums/nn72/localwoodcut/RSMV0014.mp4[/URL] [URL=http://i301.photobucket.com/albums/nn72/localwoodcut/RSMV0015.mp4]http://i301.photobucket.com/albums/nn72/localwoodcut/RSMV0015.mp4[/URL]
[u][b]Credits[/b][/u] Jagex Delta_ Enzo42 lostmyphat The Unholy/VxR Sells [/center]

item.title: Recreation [F2P Remake!]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:63, topic:470482”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=587965.msg4500103#msg4500103 date=1449370807]
If only all open-source programs did the same to arham. Require him to compile the source code himself and break the code in a way that will get run-time errors at unexpected times.
[/quote]

Well most open source programs aren’t expecting a bunch of people to steal it than release it under a different name.[/quote]
Most open source programs come with a license that states you can’t do that.

Read full topic

item.title: Recreation [F2P Remake!]
item.dc:creator: @Enyo Enyo
item.description:
@Enyo wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:59, topic:470482”][quote author=malimt link=topic=587965.msg4499716#msg4499716 date=1448873633]
Lol. I love how ppl trip.
First of all… Anti-leech is dumb af lol… Why? Cuz it gives the beginners and noobs a really hard time…
Why would you want to give somebody a hard time… Eventually someone will come and release it here as a comment or help someone… Right?
So why do it? For leechers? LMFAO. Saddest excuse i’ve heard. I’m not here to argue, just here to set something straight… If you don’t want someone to leech it, then simply do not release your work… By choosing to release your work, you should be aware of leechers out there… 70-80% of ppl leech… Simple…
So live it with it or get rid of it.
[/quote]
Cry a river. Don’t be unappreciative. If you can’t fix a simple anti leech then why the fuck are you even hosting a server.

Love how you cry on a 3 year old thread.[/quote]

@arham 4 why would you release something that you have delibrately damaged to make someones life harder, Just seems like your going out of your way to anoy someone else. Very sad.

Read full topic
